ai-sn13:1.1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-sn13:1.1.3_0: Then the Buddha, picking up a little bit of dirt under his fingernail, addressed the mendicants:
ai-sn13:1.1.5_0: Which is more: the little bit of dirt under my fingernail, or this great earth?”
ai-sn13:1.2.1_0: “Sir, the great earth is far more.
ai-sn13:1.2.2_0: The little bit of dirt under your fingernail is tiny.
ai-sn13:1.2.3_0: Compared to the great earth, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”
ai-sn13:1.2.4_0: “In the same way, for a person with comprehension, a noble disciple accomplished in view, the suffering that’s over and done with is more, what’s left is tiny.
ai-sn13:1.2.6_0: Compared to the mass of suffering in the past that’s over and done with, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part, since there are at most seven more lives.
ai-sn13:1.2.7_0: That’s how very beneficial it is to comprehend the teaching
ai-sn13:1.2.8_0: and gain the vision of the teaching.”
ai-sn13:1.2.9_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-sn13:2.1.2_0: “Mendicants, suppose there was a lotus pond that was fifty leagues long, fifty leagues wide, and fifty leagues deep, full to the brim so a crow could drink from it.
ai-sn13:2.1.3_0: And someone would remove the water from the tip of a blade.
ai-sn13:2.1.5_0: Which is more: the water on the tip of the blade of grass, or the water in the lotus pond?”
ai-sn13:2.2.1_0: “Sir, the water in the lotus pond is certainly more.
ai-sn13:2.2.2_0: The water on the tip of a blade of grass is tiny.
ai-sn13:2.2.3_0: Compared to the water in the lotus pond, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”
ai-sn13:2.3.1_0: “In the same way, for a person with comprehension, a noble disciple accomplished in view, the suffering that’s over and done with is more, what’s left is tiny.
ai-sn13:2.3.2_0: Compared to the mass of suffering in the past that’s over and done with, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part, since there are at most seven more lives.
ai-sn13:2.3.3_0: That’s how very beneficial it is to comprehend the teaching and gain the vision of the teaching.”
ai-sn13:3.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are places where the great rivers—that is,
ai-sn13:3.1.3_0: Suppose a person was to draw two or three drops of water from such a place.
ai-sn13:3.1.5_0: Which is more: the two or three drops drawn out or the water in the confluence?”
ai-sn13:3.2.1_0: “Sir, the water in the confluence is certainly more.
ai-sn13:3.2.2_0: The two or three drops of water are tiny.
ai-sn13:3.2.3_0: Compared to the water in the confluence, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”
ai-sn13:3.2.4_0: “In the same way, for a noble disciple, the suffering that’s over and done with is more ...”
ai-sn13:3.2.5_0: and gain the vision of the teaching.”
ai-sn13:4.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are places where the great rivers—that is,
ai-sn13:4.1.3_0: Suppose that water dried up and evaporated except for two or three drops.
ai-sn13:4.1.5_0: Which is more: the water in the confluence that has dried up and evaporated, or the two or three drops left?”
ai-sn13:4.2.1_0: “Sir, the water in the confluence that has dried up and evaporated is certainly more.
ai-sn13:4.2.2_0: There are two or three drops of water leftovers.
ai-sn13:4.2.3_0: Compared to the water in the confluence that has dried up and evaporated, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”
ai-sn13:4.2.4_0: “In the same way, for a noble disciple, the suffering that’s over and done with is more ...”
ai-sn13:4.2.5_0: and gain the vision of the teaching.”
ai-sn13:5.1.2_0: “Mendicants, suppose a person was to draw a clay balls the size of jujube seeds.
ai-sn13:5.1.4_0: Which is more: the seven clay balls the size of jujube seeds, or the great earth?”
ai-sn13:5.2.1_0: “Sir, the great earth is certainly more.
ai-sn13:5.2.2_0: The seven clay balls the size of jujube seeds are tiny.
ai-sn13:5.2.3_0: Compared to the great earth, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”
ai-sn13:5.2.4_0: “In the same way, for a noble disciple, the suffering that’s over and done with is more ...”
ai-sn13:5.2.5_0: and gain the vision of the teaching.”
ai-sn13:6.1.2_0: “Mendicants, suppose the great earth was worn away and eroded except for seven clay balls the size of jujube seeds.
ai-sn13:6.1.4_0: Which is more: the great earth that has been worn away and eroded, or the seven clay balls the size of jujube seeds that are left?”
ai-sn13:6.2.1_0: “Sir, the great earth that has been worn away and eroded is certainly more.
ai-sn13:6.2.2_0: The seven clay balls the size of jujube seeds are tiny.
ai-sn13:6.2.3_0: Compared to the great earth that has been worn away and eroded, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”
ai-sn13:6.2.4_0: “In the same way, for a noble disciple, the suffering that’s over and done with is more ...”
ai-sn13:6.2.5_0: and gain the vision of the teaching.”
ai-sn13:7.1.2_0: “Mendicants, suppose a man was to draw up two or three drops of water from the ocean.
ai-sn13:7.1.4_0: Which is more: the two or three drops drawn out or the water in the ocean?”
ai-sn13:7.2.1_0: “Sir, the water in the ocean is certainly more.
ai-sn13:7.2.2_0: The two or three drops of water are tiny.
ai-sn13:7.2.3_0: Compared to the water in the ocean, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”
ai-sn13:7.2.4_0: “In the same way, for a noble disciple, the suffering that’s over and done with is more ...”
ai-sn13:7.2.5_0: and gain the vision of the teaching.”
ai-sn13:8.1.2_0: “Mendicants, suppose the water in the ocean dried up and evaporated except for two or three drops.
ai-sn13:8.1.4_0: Which is more: the water in the ocean that has dried up and evaporated, or the two or three drops left?”
ai-sn13:8.2.1_0: “Sir, the water in the ocean that has dried up and evaporated is certainly more.
ai-sn13:8.2.2_0: There are two or three drops of water leftovers.
ai-sn13:8.2.3_0: Compared to the water in the ocean that has dried up and evaporated, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”
ai-sn13:8.2.4_0: “In the same way, for a noble disciple, the suffering that’s over and done with is more ...”
ai-sn13:8.2.5_0: and gain the vision of the teaching.”
ai-sn13:9.1.2_0: “Mendicants, suppose a person was to build a mountain Himalaya of the kings, seven pebbles the size of mustard seeds.
ai-sn13:9.1.4_0: Which is more: the seven pebbles the size of mustard seeds, or the Himalayas, the king of mountains?”
ai-sn13:9.2.1_0: “Sir, the Himalayas, the king of mountains, is certainly more.
ai-sn13:9.2.2_0: The seven pebbles the size of mustard seeds are tiny.
ai-sn13:9.2.3_0: Compared to the Himalayas, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”
ai-sn13:9.2.4_0: “In the same way, for a noble disciple, the suffering that’s over and done with is more ...”
ai-sn13:9.2.5_0: and gain the vision of the teaching.”
ai-sn13:10.1.2_0: “Mendicants, suppose the Himalayas, the king of mountains, was worn away and eroded except for seven pebbles the size of mustard seeds.
ai-sn13:10.1.4_0: Which is more: the portion of the Himalayas, the king of mountains, that has been worn away and eroded, or the seven pebbles the size of mustard seeds that are left?”
ai-sn13:10.2.1_0: “Sir, the portion of the Himalayas, the king of mountains, that has been worn away and eroded is certainly more.
ai-sn13:10.2.2_0: The seven pebbles the size of mustard seeds are tiny.
ai-sn13:10.2.3_0: Compared to the Himalayas, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”
ai-sn13:10.3.1_0: “In the same way, for a person with comprehension, a noble disciple accomplished in view, the suffering that’s over and done with is more, what’s left is tiny.
ai-sn13:10.3.3_0: Compared to the mass of suffering in the past that’s over and done with, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part, since there are at most seven more lives.
ai-sn13:10.3.4_0: That’s how very beneficial it is to comprehend the teaching and gain the vision of the teaching.”
ai-sn13:11.1.2_0: “Mendicants, suppose a person was to build a mountain Sineru the king of mountains.
ai-sn13:11.1.4_0: Which is more: the seven pebbles the size of mung beans, or Sineru, the king of mountains?”
ai-sn13:11.2.1_0: “Sir, Sineru, the king of mountains, is certainly more.
ai-sn13:11.2.2_0: The seven pebbles the size of mustard seeds are tiny.
ai-sn13:11.2.3_0: Compared to Sineru, it’s not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.”
ai-sn13:11.3.1_0: “In the same way, compared with the achievements of a noble disciple accomplished in view, the achievements of the ascetics, brahmins, and wanderers who follow other paths is not nearly a hundredth, a thousandth, or a hundred thousandth part.
ai-sn13:11.3.2_0: So great is the achievement of the person accomplished in view, so great is their direct knowledge.”
ai-sn13:11.3.4_0: The Linked Discourses on comprehension are complete.
